page.title: 18HOUSEHOLD GOODS IN THE BLOCK
page.content:
We conducted a survey to find out the numbers of the following items in the block.The results are as follows.
MICROWAVE OVEN 4 TELEVISION COOKER 12 (COLOUR) 10 REFRIGERATOR 13 (BLACK/WHITE) 7 DEEP FREEZE 15 TAPE RECORDER AUTOMATIC WASHING (REEL TO REEL) 2 MACHINE 1 (CASSETTE) 3 TUMBLE DRIER 3 MUSIC CENTRE/ TWIN TUB 5 STEREO 5 FOOD MIXER 7 RECORD PLAYER 2 FOOD PROCESSOR 0 RADIO 11 PRESSURE COOKER 3 CAMERA 16 DEEP FRIER 6 PROJECTOR & SLOW COOKER 2 SCREEN 1 DISH WASHER 2 TELEPHONE 7 HOME COMPUTER 1 BATH 16 VIDEO 4 SHOWER 2 MOTOR VEHICHLE 8 GREENHOUSE 2
